job_description: The Hector Fellow Academy offers you the opportunity to realize a self-developed research project under supervision Prof. Brigitte RÃ¶der. She is one of the Hector Fellows, a community of outstanding professors from different research institutions across Germany working in STEM-subjects, medicine, and psychology.She investigates how humans integrate inputs of different sensory systems and how infants and children acquire these multisensory processes. She researches age-dependent neuroplasticity, the dependence of human brain development on experience and learning. Sensitive phases in human development are investigated in people who regain sight after congenital blindness.
